Nitrogen dioxide.text: A concentration of @@pollutant@@ exceeding @@treshold@@ was observed near you. It might breach this Infomation treshold defined by the European Union Air Quality Directive (2008/50/EC) if the   remains above @@treshold@@ for @@averagingPeriod@@.

Carbon monoxide.text: A concentration of @@pollutant@@ exceeding @@treshold@@ was observed near you. It might breach the "Type of Limits" defined by the European Union Air Quality Directive (2008/50/EC) if the @@averagingPeriod@@ remains above @@treshold@@.

Ozone.text: A concentration of @@pollutant@@ exceeding @@treshold@@ was observed near you. It might breach the "Type of Limits" defined by the European Union Air Quality Directive (2008/50/EC) if the mean concentration remains above @@treshold@@ for @@averagingPeriod@@.

PM10.text: A concentration of @@pollutant@@ exceeding @@treshold@@ was observed near you. It might breach the "Type of Limits" defined by the European Union Air Quality Directive (2008/50/EC) if the  @@averagingPeriod@@ remains above @@treshold@@ more than 35 times per year.
